stories.title: Genetic studies of human–chimpanzee divergence using stem cell fusions

stories.text:
For what it seems, people who are SEO vets and the likes claim that most resources and books on SEO are snake oil (not to say worse) and no one can teach you SEO, you can learn it only yourself.

Maybe, share a different opinion? Stories of getting into SEO and utilizing the information you have obtained initially and then succeeded while gradually implementing all the required steps?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is SEO Dark Magic?
Is 5G Harmful for Humans and the Environment?
A defer feature using lambda expressions
You shouldn't have your crypto designed by a CEO
The history and evolution of an alternative monitoring system
How Tumblr Became Popular for Being Obsolete

stories.text:
HN I need your help, I’ve been torn about getting the vaccine for months now and it feels like I can’t come to a conclusion on my own no matter how hard I try.

Here’s my list of pros and cons for the vaccine.

Pro vaxx

- I don’t want covid.

- Baring myocarditis the vaccine is probably ok, side effect wise included.

- I can’t travel that much without the vaccine.

- Both mrna and viral vector technologies have been studied for a long time so they’re probably safe.

- Medical standards are probably higher and better regulated than software engineering standards.

- It’s probably good practice to get vaccinated even if the benefits are small.

- A lot of people I know had the vaccine and are ok.

- A doctor I know advised me to get the vaccine.

- I read the covid and vaxx infographics, it broadly makes sense and checks out with a super quick wikipedia page.

- I don’t think a truly harmful vaccine would be rolled out so widely

Anti vaxx

- I’m relatively young, in good shape, healthy so I’m not super worried about covid.

- I might get myocarditis.

- I don’t want to participate in the green pass thing because it’s authoritarian in my opinion.

- Even with pre-researched technology this is the first live deployment of the tech.

- What if the doctors build stuff like programmers?!

- What if they do want to turn the vaccine in a subscription model?

- A lot of people I know didn’t have the vaccine and are ok.

- Dr Malone on Joe Rogan too advised against it.

- I saw /pol/ screencaps of threads detailing how the vaccine messes up the body - broadly checks out too

- I genuinely don’t trust governments, big pharmacy, regulatory agencies, etc

I can’t decide on a side. You do it for me HN. What do I do, do I get the jab? Tell me what to think HN!
stories.title: Ask HN: Do I Get Jabbed?
Even in Web3, the Rule Is “Convenience Uber Alles”
